sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom";
import {
  Button,
  Dropdown,
  Image,
  Menu,
  Input,
  Icon,
  Segment,
  Divider,
  Container
} from "semantic-ui-react";

const Navbar = () => (
    <Segment inverted fixed="top">
    <Menu inverted  size="massive">
            <Menu.Item>
              <Image
                as={NavLink}
                to="/home"
                src="images/naxus12.PNG"
                size="small"
              />
            </Menu.Item>
    
            <Menu.Menu position="right">
              <Menu.Item className="d-flex justify-content-end">
                <Input
                  size="huge"
                  className="icon"
                  icon="search"
                  placeholder="Searching?"
                />
              </Menu.Item>
              <Menu.Item>
                <Icon name="user outline" size="large" />
                <Dropdown item text="Account">
                  <Dropdown.Menu>
                    <Dropdown.Item>
                      <Button primary size="small" as={NavLink} to="/loginscreen">
                        Login
                        <Icon name="sign in" />
                      </Button>
                    </Dropdown.Item>
                    <Dropdown.Item>
                      <Button primary size="small" as={NavLink} to="/signup">
                        Sign-up <Icon name="signup" />
                      </Button>
                    </Dropdown.Item>
                  </Dropdown.Menu>
                </Dropdown>
              </Menu.Item>
              <Menu.Item>
                <Button
                  backgroundcolor="grey"
                  inverted
                  color="black"
                  as={NavLink}
                  to="/myfavorites"
                >
                  <Icon name="heart outline" />
                  My Favorite
                </Button>
              </Menu.Item>
              <Menu.Item>
                <Button
                  backgroundcolor="grey"
                  inverted
                  color="black"
                  as={NavLink}
                  to="/cart"
                >
                  <Icon name="shopping cart" />
                  Cart
                </Button>
              </Menu.Item>
            </Menu.Menu>
          </Menu>
        <Divider />
        <Container style={{backgroundcolor:"purple"}}>
        <Menu  size="large"  widths="6">
            <Menu.Item><Button  as={NavLink} to="/naxusclub" inverted color='purple'>NAXUS CLUB</Button></Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item><Button  as={NavLink} to="/campaings" inverted color='purple' >CAMPAİNGS</Button></Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item><Button  as={NavLink} to="/brands" inverted color='purple'>BRANDS</Button></Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item><Button  as={NavLink} to="/services" inverted color='purple'>SERVİCES</Button></Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item><Button as={NavLink} to="/opportunityoftheday"  inverted color='purple'>OPPORTUNİTY OF THE DAY</Button></Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item><Button as={NavLink} to="/help"inverted color='purple'  >HELP</Button></Menu.Item>
          </Menu>
        </Container>
      </Segment>
  


)

export default Navbar;
